tit.cmt: 生駒市を補足しました。

sen.j: 円福寺（えんぷくじ）は奈良県生駒市にある真言律宗の寺院。
sen.e: The Enpuku-ji Temple is Shingonritsu sect temple in Ikoma City, Nara Prefecture.
Enpuku-ji Temple is a Shingonritsu sect temple in Ikoma City, Nara Prefecture.
Enpuku-ji Temple is a Shingonritsu sect temple in Ikoma City, Nara Prefecture.

sen.j: 生駒谷を見下ろす山腹に位置する。
sen.e: It is located half way up the mountain looking down the Ikoma valley.
It is located half way up the mountain overlooking Ikoma Valley.
It is located half way up the mountain overlooking Ikoma Valley.

sen.j: 山号は龍華山（りゅうげさん）。
sen.e: Sango is Ryugesan.
The sango (honorific mountain) is Ryugesan.
The sango (honorific mountain) is Ryugesan.

sen.j: 寺伝では天平勝宝年間(749年～757年)に行基によって創建されたとされるが、沿革は明らかではない。
sen.e: According to the temple record, it says it was constructed by Gyoki between 749 - 757, but it is not certain that this is accurate.
According to the temple record, it says it was constructed by Gyoki between 749 - 757, but it is not certain that this is accurate.
According to the temple record, it says it was constructed by Gyoki between 749 - 757, but it is not certain that this is accurate.

sen.j: 度重なる火災のため、境内には室町時代の再建による本堂のみが残る。
sen.e: Due to number of fire disasters, in the temple grounds there is only its main hall rebuilt in Muromachi period.
As a result of numerous fires, only the main hall rebuilt during the Muromachi period remains in the temple precinct.
As a result of numerous fires, only the main hall rebuilt during the Muromachi period remains in the temple precinct.

sen.j: 本堂 - 1371年年建立の和様建築、重要文化財
sen.e: Mail Hall - Wayo style architecture constructed in 1371, important cultural property
Mail Hall - Wayo style building constructed in 1371, important cultural property
Mail Hall - Wayo style building constructed in 1371, important cultural property

sen.j: 宝篋印塔2基 － 1293年銘、重要文化財
sen.e: Hokyointo Towers - inscripted in 1293, important cultural property
Two Hokyointo Towers - inscribed 1293, important cultural properties
Two Hokyointo Towers - inscribed 1293, important cultural properties

tit.cmt: This translation better fits the context

sen.e: Chikurinji Temple (Ikoma City)
Chikurinji Temple (Ikoma City)
Chikurinji Temple (Ikoma City)
Arisato, Ikoma City, Nara Prefecture
Arisato, Ikoma City, Nara Prefecture
Arisato, Ikoma City, Nara Prefecture

sen.j: 近畿日本鉄道生駒線一分駅から徒歩15分
sen.e: Kinki Nihon Tetsudo Ikoma Line Ichibu Station and then 15 minutes walk
15 minutes walk from Ichibu Station on the Kinki Nihon Tetsudo Ikoma Line.
15 minutes walk from Ichibu Station on the Kinki Nihon Tetsudo Ikoma Line.
